name: Cult Jacuzzi
description:
Cult Jacuzzi is a procedurally generated exploration game. This game is unique it is like Internet in a way! Try not to go crazy from randomness you experience! Explore the Cult Jacuzzi grand plane! Be encouraged!

#asylumjam2016

#procjam

Be warned it has mature level if you activate it! Developers are not responsible for pictures that will be fetched during the gameplay!

Game is using CC music from: https://archive.org/details/Blacklab-Black_Forest
Logo designed by Igor Mijucic http://kontura.co/

Thanks to all that participated in creating this masterpiece!

GameJolt link: http://gamejolt.com/games/cult-jacuzzi/208405

GitHub link: https://github.com/fanna/cult-jacuzzi
